params._batchIndexToLockIn: the locking id to lock at .
params._extendPeriod: the period to extend the locking. in batchTime.

params._agreementHash: is a hash of agreement required to be added to the TX by participants
params._avatar: the avatar to mint reputation from
params._batchesIndexCap: the max batch index which allows to lock in . this value capped by BATCHES_HARDCAP
params._maxLockingBatches: - maximum number of locking batches (in _batchTime units)
params._redeemEnableTime: redeem enable time .       redeem reputation can be done after this time.
params._repRewardConstA: - reputation allocation per batch is calculated by :  _repRewardConstA * (_repRewardConstB ** batchIndex)
params._repRewardConstB: - reputation allocation per batch is calculated by :  _repRewardConstA * (_repRewardConstB ** batchIndex)
params._reputationReward: the reputation reward per locking batch that this contract will reward       for the token locking

params._amount: the amount of token to lock
params._batchIndexToLockIn: the locking id to lock in.
params._period: the period to lock. in batchTime units

repRewardPerBatch(uint256).details: repRewardPerBatch function the calculation is done the following formula: RepReward =  repRewardConstA * (repRewardConstB**_batchIndex)

params._batchIndex: the batch number to calc rep reward of
